entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 10:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
